seo.description: All-inclusive website packages for UK small businesses: strategy, professional copy, SEO, GA4 tracking — everything included. Starter from £1,495, Growth from £795, E-commerce from £4,995. No hidden costs.

content.eyebrow: Website packages — transparent pricing in GBP
content.title: All-inclusive website packages for UK small businesses
content.subtitle: Strategy + copy + SEO + tracking = one price. No hidden fees.
content.body:
Most agencies give you a website and leave the rest to you. We include everything: strategy, professional copywriting, technical SEO and conversion tracking — because a website without these is just a brochure.

Choose your starting point below, or tell us your goal and we'll recommend the right package.

header.title: Pick the package that matches your stage
header.subtitle: Every package includes strategy, copy, SEO and tracking. The difference is scope and complexity.

items.title: Starter Package — from £1,495
items.description:
For businesses starting from scratch or replacing a DIY website.

Everything you need to launch a professional online presence that generates enquiries:

• Digital strategy & positioning workshop
• Up to 5 pages (Home, About, Services, Contact + 1)
• Professional SEO copywriting (we write everything)
• Responsive mobile-first design
• Technical SEO setup (metadata, sitemap, robots, schema)
• GA4 + GTM tracking & key events
• Contact forms with lead notifications
• Core Web Vitals optimisation
• 30-day post-launch support

Typical delivery: 3–4 weeks

items.title: Growth Package — from £795 + Ads
items.description:
Your website exists but doesn't generate leads. Let's fix that.

We audit what's blocking results and fix the critical points:

• Full website & conversion audit
• Message, headline and CTA rewrite
• Key page redesign (up to 3 pages)
• GA4/GTM tracking setup & key events
• SEO quick wins (metadata, structure, internal links)
• Google Ads or Meta Ads setup & first campaign
• Landing page for lead generation
• Monthly reporting dashboard
• 30-day optimisation period

Typical delivery: 2–3 weeks

items.title: E-commerce Package — from £4,995
items.description:
An online shop built to sell — not just display products.

Strategy, design and growth support for a real sales engine:

• E-commerce strategy & product structure
• Up to 20 products + category pages
• Professional product descriptions (SEO copy)
• Payment & shipping integration
• Conversion-optimised checkout flow
• GA4/GTM e-commerce tracking (add-to-cart, purchase)
• Technical SEO & product schema
• Email setup (order confirmations, abandoned cart)
• 60-day post-launch support

Typical delivery: 5–7 weeks

accordion.title: How much does a website cost for a small business in the UK?
accordion.content: Our all-inclusive packages start from £1,495 for a 5-page website with strategy, professional copy, SEO and GA4 tracking included. Unlike many agencies, we don't charge extra for copywriting or analytics setup. For businesses with an existing website that needs fixing, our Growth package starts from £795.

accordion.title: What's included in 'all-inclusive'?
accordion.content: Everything you need: strategy workshop, professional SEO copywriting (we write it all), responsive design, mobile optimisation, technical SEO, GA4/GTM tracking setup, contact forms and 30-day post-launch support. No hidden costs, no extras.

accordion.title: Do I need to write my own website copy?
accordion.content: No. We write all the copy for you — headlines, service descriptions, about page, CTAs, everything. We start with a strategy session to understand your business, then deliver professional, conversion-focused copy in British English. You review and we refine until it's right.

accordion.title: How long does it take to build a website?
accordion.content: Our Starter package typically takes 3–4 weeks from kick-off to launch. The Growth package is faster — usually 2–3 weeks. E-commerce projects take 5–7 weeks depending on the number of products and complexity. We always agree a timeline before starting.

accordion.title: Do you offer monthly payment plans?
accordion.content: We offer flexible payment terms: typically 50% upfront and 50% on launch. For larger projects, we can discuss instalments. Our optional monthly growth retainer (from £395/month) is month-to-month with no lock-in contract.

accordion.title: Can you help with SEO and Google Ads after launch?
accordion.content: Yes. Our monthly growth support package includes ongoing SEO, content updates, Ads management and conversion optimisation. You can add it after any package — or start with just the website and upgrade later.

accordion.title: What platform do you build on?
accordion.content: We use modern frameworks (Next.js, React) for maximum performance and SEO. For e-commerce, we integrate with established platforms. We choose the right technology based on your needs — not a one-size-fits-all approach.

accordion.title: Do you work with businesses outside the UK?
accordion.content: Yes. We're a remote-first agency and work with clients across Europe. Our team is based in Europe with native English copywriting capability, so we deliver UK-market-ready content regardless of location.
